chapter.title: Quickstart
chapter.para: As a developer you have basically two ways in which you can use the OpenEngSB. One option is to use the OpenEngSB as a runtime environment for any project. In addition you've the possibility to write Plug-Ins (Domains, Connectors, ...) for the OpenEngSB. Both cases are explained in this chapter.
